name: The Flames (Morgan)
description:
First game made; with the the help of BlackthornProd for everything from art to Programming and it helped me get a feel for the Unity Game Engine. I hope you enjoy as much as I enjoyed making it. I do plan to add characters and other weapons into the game in the future, but I also wanted to work on different projects. 

The Music I used: 

Menu Music: https://soundcloud.com/tomomp3/by-the-fireplace 

Game Music: https://soundcloud.com/adhesivewombat/adhesivewombat-8-bit-adventure
